title: Test old lenses: Voigtlander Septon & Steinheil Quinon
content:
Adapting Steinheil Quinon on Leica CL, and Voigtlander Septon on Leica M9P.
Also tried Sigma BF and new silver L-mount lenses.
summary:
Adapting Steinheil Quinon on Leica CL, and Voigtlander Septon on Leica M9P.
